languages.text: "Соратники! Настала пора вам познакомиться с наш{mf|им|ей} сильнейш{mf|им|ей} союзни{mf|ком|цей}! Сам{mf||а} Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус участвует в нашем сопротивлении! Можем ли мы проиграть с такой могучей подмогой?!"

"My brothers and sisters! It is time for you to meet our greatest ally! Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself} is part of the resistance! I ask you, how can we fail with someone so mighty fighting on our side?"
languages.original_text: "Соратники! Настала пора вам познакомиться с наш{mf|им|ей} сильнейш{mf|им|ей} союзни{mf|ком|цей}! Сам{mf||а} Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус участвует в нашем сопротивлении! Можем ли мы проиграть с такой могучей подмогой?!"

traits.locale_text: "My comrades! It is time for you to meet our greatest ally! Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself} is part of the resistance! I ask you, how can we fail with someone so mighty fighting on our side?"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.locale_text: "My brothers and sisters! It is time for you to meet our greatest ally! Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself} is part of the resistance! I ask you, how can we fail with someone so mighty fighting on our side?"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “我的兄弟们，姐妹们！是时候让各位见见我们最伟大的盟友了！行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯本人，也是我们反抗军的成员！我想问问大家，有这么强大的人与我们并肩作战，我们的事业怎么可能会失败？”
languages.original_text: "My brothers and sisters! It is time for you to meet our greatest ally! Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself} is part of the resistance! I ask you, how can we fail with someone so mighty fighting on our side?"

traits.locale_text: “我的兄弟们，姐妹们！是时候让各位见见我们最伟大的盟友了！行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯本人，也是我们反抗军的成员！我想问问大家，有这么强大的人与我们并肩作战，我们的事业怎么可能会失败？”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「兄弟姉妹よ！最高に心強い仲間を紹介しよう！我がレジスタンスに自由開拓者、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスが加わってくださった！これほど偉大な方が我々の側にいれば、何も恐れることはない！」
languages.original_text: "My brothers and sisters! It is time for you to meet our greatest ally! Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself} is part of the resistance! I ask you, how can we fail with someone so mighty fighting on our side?"

traits.locale_text: 「兄弟姉妹よ！最高に心強い仲間を紹介しよう！我がレジスタンスに自由開拓者、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスが加わってくださった！これほど偉大な方が我々の側にいれば、何も恐れることはない！」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «¡Hermanos y hermanas, es hora de que conozcáis a nuestr{mf|o|a} mayor aliad{mf|o|a}! ¡{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius en persona es parte de la resistencia! ¿Cómo podemos fracasar con su inmenso poder de nuestro lado?».
languages.original_text: "My brothers and sisters! It is time for you to meet our greatest ally! Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself} is part of the resistance! I ask you, how can we fail with someone so mighty fighting on our side?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Hermanos y hermanas, es hora de que conozcáis a nuestr{mf|o|a} mayor aliad{mf|o|a}! ¡{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius en persona es parte de la resistencia! ¿Cómo podemos fracasar con su inmenso poder de nuestro lado?».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "My brothers and sisters! It is time for you to meet our greatest ally! Rogue Trader  von Valancius {mf|himself|herself} is part of the resistance! I ask you, how can we fail with someone so mighty fighting on our side?"

languages.text: « Mes frères, mes sœurs ! Il est temps pour vous de faire la connaissance de notre plus {mf|grand allié|grande alliée} ! {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius {mf|lui-même|elle-même} s'est {mf|joint|jointe} à la résistance ! Avec une telle pointure à nos côtés, comment pourrions-nous échouer ? »
languages.original_text: "My brothers and sisters! It is time for you to meet our greatest ally! Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself} is part of the resistance! I ask you, how can we fail with someone so mighty fighting on our side?"

traits.locale_text: « Mes frères, mes sœurs ! Il est temps pour vous de faire la connaissance de notre plus {mf|grand allié|grande alliée} ! {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius {mf|lui-même|elle-même} s'est {mf|joint|jointe} à la résistance ! Avec une telle pointure à nos côtés, comment pourrions-nous échouer ? »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Meine Brüder und Schwestern! Es ist Zeit, dass Ihr {mf|unseren größten Verbündeten|unsere größte Verbündete} kennenlernt! {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius persönlich ist Teil des Widerstands! Ich frage Euch, wie sollen wir scheitern, wenn jemand so Mächtiges an unserer Seite kämpft?"
languages.original_text: "My brothers and sisters! It is time for you to meet our greatest ally! Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself} is part of the resistance! I ask you, how can we fail with someone so mighty fighting on our side?"

traits.locale_text: "Meine Brüder und Schwestern! Es ist Zeit, dass Ihr {mf|unseren größten Verbündeten|unsere größte Verbündete} kennenlernt! {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius persönlich ist Teil des Widerstands! Ich frage Euch, wie sollen wir scheitern, wenn jemand so Mächtiges an unserer Seite kämpft?"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Kardeşlerim! En büyük müttefikimizle tanışmanızın vakti geldi! Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius, artık bizzat direnişimizin bir parçası! Sorarım size: Böylesine kudretli bir şahıs yanımızdayken başarısız olma ihtimalimiz var mı?"
languages.original_text: "My brothers and sisters! It is time for you to meet our greatest ally! Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself} is part of the resistance! I ask you, how can we fail with someone so mighty fighting on our side?"
